front.title: Problem Statement and Requirement for Inband Flow Learning

abstract.t: On-path telemetry techniques can provide high-precision inband flow insight and real-time network performance monitoring. Although they are benefical, network operators still face challenges applying such techniques, especially flow identification when deploying flow- oriented monitoring on a large scale. This document introduces the real network scenarios, and intends to address the problems by proposing the requirements of inband flow learning mechenism that can be used to implement inband flow information telemetry for deployability and flexibility.
